name: Force
description:
Simple physics-y platformer I made for my first game jam I've ever been a part of.

Solo project. Programming, art, and (most of) the sound by me. Built in C++ using my own tech, a custom engine built on SDL2 (with SDL_Image), Freetype2, and OpenGL with GLEW.

Controls:

Alt+Enter will toggle fullscreen.

Left/Right - Move

Z - Trigger Platforms

Controllers are supported:

Back will toggle fullscreen.

DPad or Analog stick - Move

A Button - Trigger Platforms
